about_the_game:
Once Upon a Slime is the first game that I am making in my career of a game developer and is an arenashooter / Bossbeater game about a little slime.

At the moment there are 3 gamemodes in development:


- Endless / Survival Mode
- Story Mode
- Pacifist Mode

Endless / Survival Mode will throw you in an arena with an infinite spawning number of enemies. Shoot enough of these enemies and you will level up, making you able to pick new weapons, abilities or upgrades. There is also a store in this gamemode in which you can buy certain skill upgrades or new special weapons.

Story Mode will take you on an adventure in which you need to progress through levels and beat a couple bosses along the way!

Pacifist Mode also throws you in an arena with spawning waves of enemies except you are not able to shoot any enemies! make sure to dodge al those scary slimes by using the dash ability!

Controls


- AWSD or arrow keys to move your hero!
- Left click to shoot
- Right click to dash
